query: MERGE (q1:Qualification {name:"PCMC"}) MERGE (q2:Qualification {name:"PCMB"}) MERGE (q3:Qualification {name:"Biopsychology"}) MERGE (q4:Qualification {name:"Humanities"}) MERGE (q5:Qualification {name:"Commerce"}) MERGE (i1:Interest {name:"Coding"}) MERGE (i2:Interest {name:"Business"}) MERGE (i3:Interest {name:"Law"}) MERGE (i4:Interest {name:"Medicine"}) MERGE (i5:Interest {name:"Social Service"}) MERGE (c1:Course {name:"B.Tech Computer Science"}) MERGE (c2:Course {name:"BBA"}) MERGE (c3:Course {name:"LLB"}) MERGE (c4:Course {name:"MBBS"}) MERGE (c5:Course {name:"BA Sociology"}) MERGE (q1)-[:RELATES_TO {score:5}]->(i1) MERGE (q1)-[:RELATES_TO {score:3}]->(i2) MERGE (q2)-[:RELATES_TO {score:4}]->(i4) MERGE (q3)-[:RELATES_TO {score:4}]->(i5) MERGE (q4)-[:RELATES_TO {score:5}]->(i3) MERGE (q5)-[:RELATES_TO {score:5}]->(i2) MERGE (i1)-[:LEADS_TO]->(c1) MERGE (i2)-[:LEADS_TO]->(c2) MERGE (i3)-[:LEADS_TO]->(c3) MERGE (i4)-[:LEADS_TO]->(c4) MERGE (i5)-[:LEADS_TO]->(c5) MERGE (u:User {name:"Student1"}) MERGE (u)-[:HAS_INTEREST {score:4}]->(i1) MERGE (u)-[:HAS_INTEREST {score:2}]->(i2) MATCH (u:User)-[ui:HAS_INTEREST]->(i:Interest) MATCH (q:Qualification)-[qi:RELATES_TO]->(i) MATCH (i)-[:LEADS_TO]->(c:Course) WHERE u.name="Student1" RETURN c.name AS SuggestedCourse, q.name AS Qualification, i.name AS Interest, ui.score AS InterestScore, qi.score AS QualificationInterestScore ORDER BY (ui.score * qi.score) DESC LIMIT 3;
